ygData.subject: Re: Skill caps
ygData.msgSnippet: don t know about your magic skill equation each of the magic attributes for me is at lvl 35 and i am only lvl 6 but with your calculations i should be getting
ygData.messageBody:
don't know about your magic skill equation each of the magic attributes
for me is at lvl 35 and i am only lvl 6 but with your calculations i
should be getting 65 at lvl 6 correct me if i am wrong.



Wolf wrote:

> I m writing down my skill levels every time a skill improves, so I
> have an overview on which skill to work more. What I ve seen recently
> is a strange behavior in some skills. I know that the combat skill is
> maxed at (level +1) * 3, and the magic skills at (level+1) * 5. But
> what about Offense and Defense ? Those are important, and if you
> neglect them you will be very sorry at higher levels. I ve seen the
> following from lvl 10 to lvl 13: level 10: Defense 45level 11: Defense
> 48level 12: Defense 51level 13: Defense 54 So, these numbers would
> indicate a (level+5) * 3 I cant really believe this. Are we really
> that weak in defense ? At higher levels every critter will hit us for
> max damage. If somebody knows if this is correct, please reply. When
> the Mobs have (level+1) * 5 and we have only 3, this would be
> dissapointing.

--
